channel.title: Red Dead Redemption Undead Nightmare
channel.description:
[b]OUT NOW! AVALIBLE ON XBOX 800 MICROSOFT POINTS and $10 for the Playstation Network[/b]
http://rockstargames.com/reddeadredemption/news for more information
Just finished playing it for 1 hour. Found one of the 4 Apocalypse horses already (the fire one) rocky start but it gets better.
btw, my next personal mission is to find a Sasquatch!
[size=20pt]EDIT: IF YOUR GOING TO BUY IT THEN GET THE DISK VERSION BECAUSE IF YOU DOWNLOAD IT YOU GET MAJOR PROBLEMS SAVING THEM TO YOUR HARD DRIVE.[/size]

item.title: Red Dead Redemption Undead Nightmare
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

Been playing it for awhile now and theres a few problems that I’ve encountered, the big one is, I don’t think they beta tested it. Certain parts on the map seem to make you lag and sometimes walk into mountains and can’t get back out, and that part happens to be in a mission. Might just be how I downloaded it but its just something I’d point out.

Read full topic
